channel.title: I need a script!
channel.description:
Yeah hello i need a powerchopper and i was looking if anyone had one. I searched the forums found some didnt work. I got excited about this one http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11863.0.html but gave really weird errors first was line 31 dublicate label1 or something like that i programmed c++ before so i have some knowlodge of how programming works. Im new here. Thank you very much
-------
Uronflames. :cool:

item.title: I need a script!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

DropTo(InvNum1, InvNum2); Drops from the first Inventory number you put, to the second. This way, if you have an axe in your inv, you can use DropTo(2, 28); So it won’t drop the first inv item. But there might be a better dropping procedure.

Read full topic

can u give it to me i can add the drop command

item.title: I need a script!
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

Meh. Dropping is really easy. Just add the SRL command in for drop all, or use my base for a bitmap item dropper in the useful functions/procedures section.

Read full topic
